text: Fury is a 1936 American crime drama movie directed by Fritz Lang and was based on the story Mob Rule by Norman Krasna. It stars Spencer Tracy, Sylvia Sidney, Walter Abel, Bruce Cabot, Walter Brennan, Frank Albertson, Edward Ellis, Gwen Lee, George Chandler, Edwin Maxwell and distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1937. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1936 crime drama movies Category:1930s American crime drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Fritz Lang Category:American thriller movies Category:Black-and-white movies Category:English-language movies Category:Film noir Category:Legal movies Category:Movies about capital punishment Category:Movies about revenge Category:Prison movies Category:United States National Film Registry movies
title: Fury (1936 movie)
